data.title: Great atmosphere and good good
data.text: The atmosphere is great.  I like the appetizers very much.  A vast selection of botttled beers and wine.  No liquor though.

data.title: Great vibe!
data.text: Mainstreet After Hours is the kind of place you want to hang out in for hours.  The atmosphere is warm, hip, and friendly and the staff is too.  The wine and beer list is long, but not too long, and the food is designed to go well with the drinks.  There is an outdoor patio perfect for relaxing either on the couches or at the tables next to a large brick wall mural and surrounded by planters and music.

data.title: Great wine, nice atmosphere
data.text: Nice place to go before seeing a show or performance at the Arts Center. The food is very good although limited. Nice selection of beverages.

data.title: Fun ladies night/date night spot
data.text: I think the hours are listed incorrectly. The After Hours is the bar part and the coffee shop side has daytime hours. Anyway, the bar part is so nice. Very clean. Lots of wine and beer options. Flights available on wines. The light plate options look really good too. The staff is always friendly and attentive. I like that it's smaller and never crazy busy. It's very clean and it's a great change of scenery from the other dining options on that street.
